meanings.sent1: The story was so uninventive that I could predict the ending.
meanings.sent2: Her uninventive approach to problem-solving hindered progress.
meanings.sent3: His uninventive excuse for being late was blaming the traffic.
meanings.sent4: The artist's work was as uninventive as a blank canvas.
meanings.sent5: The uninventive presentation failed to capture the audience's attention.

meanings.sent1: The uninventive design of the building made it blend in with the rest.
meanings.sent2: She received criticism for her uninventive ideas during the brainstorming session.
meanings.sent3: The uninventive costume at the party was just a bedsheet with holes.
meanings.sent4: His uninventive mind was like a closed book, unwilling to explore new ideas.
meanings.sent5: The uninventive solution to the problem was to do nothing and hope for the best.
